refnamediv.refpurpose: This function is used to extract features from an image.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: feat = extractHOGFeatures(I) returns extracted HOG features from a truecolor or grayscale input image, I. The features are returned in a 1-by-N vector,where N is the HOG feature length.
